core.changelog:
- In-Editor Update System: automatic update checking from GitHub Pages
- Update dialog with changelog display, progress bar, and version comparison
- One-click download and installation from GitHub Releases
- Automatic preservation of configuration.json during updates
- Skip This Version and Remind Me Later options
- Configurable auto-check interval via Project Settings

premium.changelog:
- Initial premium release
- All Core features included
- Merchant/Trading System
- NPC Scheduled/Routine System
- Equipment System (slot-based, set bonuses)
- Leveling & Progression
- Extended Runtime Item (durability, enchantments, cooldown)
- Reputation System, Level-Gated Quests, Timed Quests
